title.en: Awakening to the Joy of Painting

synopsis:
Life and priorities change for listless high school Yatora when he sees his classmate's painting and discovers an appreciation and talent for art.

(Source: Netflix)

Yatora enters the art club. Over summer break he takes part in special training to improve his skills after switching his college choice to art school.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: Prep School Debut of the Dead

synopsis:
Yatora joins Yuka for extra lessons at Tokyo Art Institute. He has an artistic breakthrough when visiting a museum with his strange new classmates.

(Source: Netflix)

TAI's night students join the intimidating afternoon classes to gear up for the next competition as the stress of art exams weighs on Yatora's friends.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: Helpless Even If I Know What To Do

synopsis:
As exams near, Oba intensifies training. Yatora struggles to articulate abstract concepts, so Saeki encourages him to use a larger canvas for fun.

(Source: Netflix)

Yatora experiments with various tools to find a secret weapon that will boost his art while exam stress begins to wear on the students' health.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: The Start of the First Exam

synopsis:
Oba tells Yatora his weakness, which sends him spiraling. But a heart-to-heart with a close friend reignites his confidence as the first exam begins.

(Source: Netflix)

The first exam subject is "self-portrait". A mishap gives Yatora the hint he needs; Oba takes the class to a museum before exam results are announced.

(Source: Netflix)

Three move on to the second exam, including Yatora, who must master "color". Yatora worries after Yuka gets a seedy job and refuses to go to art school.

(Source: Netflix)

Yuka and Yatora head to Odawara and bare their souls and bodies, hoping to overcome their personal challenges with art and their surrounding fears.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: The Start of the Second Exam

synopsis:
After drawing his own body, Yatora is ready for the second exam: a nude model. But when his health declines from stress, Oba offers a secret weapon.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: When I Started to be Dyed in Color

synopsis:
The second exam is in full swing. Yatora struggles with illness and an unclear theme when sudden inspiration delivers answers and a final secret weapon.

(Source: Netflix)
